====Usage notes====
Within a character, it may become either ⻌, ⻍, or ⻎. <!--glyphs from CJK Radicals Supplement-->
This may also depend on computer fonts.
The form ⻌ (one dot) is usually seen in simplified characters.
Do not confuse with [[廴]].
